title: How to Glue Fabric to a Hat Frame

steps.headline: Obtain milliner's glue and a small paintbrush.
steps.description: The paintbrush should be of good quality and kept for this purpose alone.

steps.headline: Cover the surface of the hat frame where the fabric is to be applied with glue.
steps.description: Allow to stand about five minutes.

steps.headline: Apply another coat of glue to the hat frame.
steps.description: Firmly smooth the fabric over the freshly glued surface.

steps.headline: Press and smooth one small area at a time.
Be sure material has adhered to frame on each space glued, before going on to the next space.
Dry.
steps.description: When all material has been glued to frame, allow to dry thoroughly.
